data.oai_dc:dc: MBNMS/PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Esalen, California, USA (ESA001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Esalen, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a StowAway Tidbit Temperature Logger (Onset Computer Corp. TBIC32+4+27) beginning 2005-09-06. The instrument depth was 000 meters, in an overall water depth of 25 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 4.0 minutes.
